columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the LNO record.

columns.name: LAB_REP_DATA_DATE
columns.description: The date the report data was filled into the Patient Summary Extract (LNO) record. This usually contains the report date.

columns.name: LAB_ID
columns.description: The lab record ID that this Patient Summary Extract (LNO) is linked to.

columns.name: LAB_REPORT_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The result report type category number for the result report.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Single Specimen Report


End of Day Report


End of Week Report


Discharge Report


STAT Report


Encounter Level Report


Multiple Encounter Report


Hold till all final Report


Any Final Report


Any Prelim or Final Report


Final Summary Report


Adhoc Report


Master Record

columns.name: REQUISITION_ID
columns.description: Stores the requisition record if any for which this record was created.

columns.name: SUBMITTER_ID
columns.description: This is the submitter associated with the specimen on the report.

columns.name: SUBMITTER_ID_RECORD_NAME
columns.description: The name of the submitter record.

columns.name: REQ_GRP_ID
columns.description: This is the reference lab patient associated with the specimen on the report.

columns.name: CASE_ID
columns.description: Stores the case record for which this record was created.
